markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Megaloceros](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2202)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Similar in form to the elk but far superior in size is the megaloceros. The average male is a towering creature with antlers that alone weigh nearly 100 pounds. These antlers are enormous and can be wider than their bodies are long. Megaloceroses stand up to 9 feet tall, weighing 1,500 pounds and with antlers growing over 12 feet wide.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 21

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 19

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Megaloceros.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Megaloceros](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2202)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 608, [Pathfinder #176: Lost Mammoth Valley](/Sources.aspx?ID=113) pg. 85</row>

**Perception** +10; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +13, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +10

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +3

**Con** +5

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +13 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +8 

</row>

**HP** 58

**[Buck](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=6)** <actions string="Reaction" /> DC 21

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 50 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
antlers +13 ([deadly d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174)),
**Damage** 2d6+7 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hoof +13 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 2d4+7 bludgeoning

**Furious Charge** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The megaloceros Strides twice and then makes a hoof Strike. If the Strike hits, it deals an additional 2d4 bludgeoning damage.

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="/images/Icons/Sidebar_5_TreasureAndRewards.png">Megaloceros Antlers</title>

The antlers of a megaloceros are some of the most impressive animal trophies, known to fetch a fair price among collectors, particularly those who live far from regions where these majestic elk live. A set of megaloceros antlers in collectible condition can fetch prices of 40 gp, but as with all animal trophies, peddling in such wares can attract the attention of angry druids, vengeful rangers, or offended naturalists.
</aside>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-301" />
name: Megaloceros
